Kural_Info.Chapter: அவையறிதல் (The Knowledge of the Council Chamber)
Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: புல்லவையுள் பொச்சாந்தும் சொல்லற்க நல்லவையுள்நன்குசலச் சொல்லு வார்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Those who are able to speak good things impressively in an assembly of the good should not even forgetfully speak them in that of the low.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A master orator, who is known for speaking brilliantly in assemblies of the good, is shown approaching an assembly of the ignorant ('புல்லவை').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The assembly of the ignorant is visualized as a barren field of stone and dust, incapable of bearing fruit.
Layered_Composition.Background: The orator is carrying precious, glowing seeds, representing their good and potent words. Even though they seem to forget themselves for a moment ('பொச்சாந்தும்'), they instinctively stop themselves from casting these precious seeds onto the barren ground, knowing it would be a complete waste. They hold their words back ('சொல்லற்க').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Even in a moment of carelessness, a great speaker who is effective in a worthy assembly should refrain from speaking their valuable words in an unworthy assembly.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The ignorant assembly as a barren field and the valuable words as precious seeds is the central metaphor. The act of withholding the seeds is a conscious act of preserving their value. Wasting them would be the folly.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The orator and their seeds glow with a golden light of wisdom. The ignorant assembly and the barren field are depicted in dull, sterile, grey and brown tones.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that focuses on the orator's moment of decision, as they look at the barren field and wisely decide to withhold their precious seeds.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a strong textural contrast between the glowing seeds and the sterile ground.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The orator is the source of light, and they are choosing not to waste it on the surrounding darkness.

Cultural_Anchors: Do not speak, even forgetfully (பொச்சாந்தும் சொல்லற்க)
